pages.text: Too many brews to hold in your hands?! Well, how 'bout you make a bag for it? A Brew Bag! I'll show ya how to make one since I'm feeling nice, though I gotta warn ya, the bag can only hold $(bold)throwable brews$()!
Press Open Brew Bag key (Default: H) to open bag's inventory, Open Brew Circle key (Default: J) to throw a brew from it.
